text: Allah ke nazdeek deen sirf Islam hai, is deen se hatt kar jo mukhtalif tareeqe un logon ne ikhtiyar kiye jinhein kitab di gayi thi, unke is tarz e amal ki koi wajah iske siwa na thi ke unhon ne ilm aa janey ke baad aapas mein ek dusre par zyadati karne ke liye aisa kiya. Aur jo koi Allah ke ehkaam o hidayaat ki itaat se inkar karde, Allah ko ussey hisaab lete kuch dair nahin lagti hai
